unit.utterance: Be nāme xodā kollan film yek kuhestāni rā nešān midād yek jāye kuhestāni bud ke deraxt dāšt va masalan mazrae bud
unit.utterance_translation: In the name of God, the film shows a mountain, a hilly region where there was a farm full of trees

unit.utterance: yek āqāyi rā nešān midād ke dāšt az deraxte golābi bā nardebān rafte bud bālā dāšt golābihā rā mičid
unit.utterance_translation: it shows a man who was picking pears on the tree

unit.utterance: baad miyāmad pāyin golābihā rā migozāšt tuye sabadhā
unit.utterance_translation: he climbs down and puts the pears in the basket

unit.utterance: jābejā mikard do tā sabad golābi čide bud
unit.utterance_translation: he moves them. he has already picked two baskets of pears.

unit.utterance: sabadhā pāyine deraxt bud yek pesarbačeyi ke dāšt bā dočarxe az ānjā rad mišod
unit.utterance_translation: the baskets were down the tree, a little boy who was passing by

unit.utterance: pesar bačeye šeytāni bud
unit.utterance_translation: was a naughty kid

unit.utterance: dāšt rad mišod did ke in āqā havāsaš nist miāyad yek sabad golābie in āqā rā midozdad
unit.utterance_translation: while he was passing by the tree he stole one of the baskets while the man was on the tree

unit.utterance: midozdad harkat mikonad miravad dāšte bā dočarxe mirafte tuye masire xodaš yek doxtari rā mibinad
unit.utterance_translation: and he goes away. on his was he sees a girl

unit.utterance: yek doxtarbačeyi ke hamsen o sale xodaš bud dāšte be doxtare tavajoh mikarde controlaš rā az dast midahad
unit.utterance_translation: the girl was the same age as him, while he was looking at the girl, he lost control

unit.utterance: part mišavad pāyin tamāme golābihā mirizad zamin
unit.utterance_translation: and he falls, all the pears spilled out

unit.utterance: baad in čekār mikonad? Do se tā pesarbačeye digar hamsenne xodaš tuye masir dāštand miyāmadand
unit.utterance_translation: there came a few other boys

unit.utterance: miāyand beheš komak mikonand golābihā rā jam mikonand baad in savāre dočarxeaš mišavad dāšte mirafte
unit.utterance_translation: they come and help him gather the pears, then he gets on his bike and he was about to go

unit.utterance: ān pesarhā mibinand ke in kolāhaš rā jā gozāšte
unit.utterance_translation: the boys saw his hat on the ground

unit.utterance: baad sedāyaš mikonand, beheš sut mizanand in barmigardad kolāhaš rā az ānhā migirad
unit.utterance_translation: they whistle to him, he comes back and takes his hat

unit.utterance: baad bexātere inke azašān tašakor konad behešān nafari yek dāne golābi midahad
unit.utterance_translation: and in order to thank them, he gives each of them a pear

unit.utterance: baad inhā be samte hamān deraxti miraftand ke ān āqā dāšt golābihā rā mičid
unit.utterance_translation: they were passing by the the tree on which the man was picking pears

unit.utterance: baad āqāhe ke miāyad pāyin mibinad ke yek sabad golābiaš dozdide šode
unit.utterance_translation: the man climbed down the tree and found out one of the basket was stolen

unit.utterance: bad be in pesarbačehā negāh mikonad mibinad tuye daste har kodāme inhā yek golābi ast
unit.utterance_translation: he looks at the boys and sees a pear in the hands of each one

unit.utterance: montāhā ānhā bixabar budand az in qaziye
unit.utterance_translation: but the boys didn't know anything

unit.utterance: dāštand rad mišodand vali āqāhe fekr mikard ke kollan kāre inhā bude inhā golābihā rā dozdidand
unit.utterance_translation: they were just passing and the man was wondering whether they stole the pears

unit.utterance: baad rad mišavand miravand āqāhe ham čizi be in pesarbačehā nemiguyad ān pesar ham ke miravad va dāstān tamām mišavad.
unit.utterance_translation: they just left and the man didn't say anything to them, the little boy went away too and the story came to an end.
